We illustrate this separation below for a one-year fixed for floating swap with a fixed rate
of F, fixed payments at time n of F, and floating rate payments at time n of S.
First payment (90 days from now) = S - F, which is known at time zero because the
payment 90 days from now is based on 90-day Libor at time 0 and the swap fixed
rate, F, both of which are known at the initiation of the swap.
